Title: S6 Ep. 241 - Alberto Arenaza - Reimagining the Future of Work
Description:
Alberto Arenaza’s episode was insightful, poignant, and real. Why? Let’s start with his mentoring advice: “Get okay with failing fast and failing often, get comfortable with it.” His reply to the question, What is the hardest lesson that changed your life had to do with basketball, learning that he could no longer play basketball and collapsed during a game and discovered he had a heart condition. Yet, it was the greatest thing that happened in his life. This episode is filled with so many great moments that you will remember as wisdom nuggets that change your life. Be sure to tune in and be present for this episode without distraction.
